definition: behind the scenes
curtain or screen/canopy or tent/headquarters of a general/act (of a play)
old variant of 幕[mu4]/curtain/screen
empress/queen/(archaic) monarch/ruler
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
surname Hou
to manipulate from behind the scenes/to pull the strings
news from behind the scenes/stage gossip
malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand

sentences.english: They are brewing a plot behind the scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在幕后策划一个阴谋。

sentences.english: Dare to look at the facts behind the foods you eat.
sentences.chinese: 你敢去看你吃的食物的幕后事实？

sentences.english: Many people are asking what is behind the Panama papers.
sentences.chinese: 许多人在问巴拿马文件的幕后动机。

sentences.english: ZTE, by contrast, keeps itself in the background.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，中兴公司始终使自己处在幕后的位置。

sentences.english: Put your energy into behind the scenes activities.
sentences.chinese: 将精力投入到幕后活动。

sentences.english: The company behind the scheme is Sunburst Biotechnologies.
sentences.chinese: 幕后的公司是新保思生物科技有限公司。

sentences.english: At the time i had a lawyer on payroll and i hid behind the action.
sentences.chinese: 当时在工资表上我雇有一个律师，我躲在幕后。

sentences.english: There are many things going in the background but almost nothing is reported.
sentences.chinese: 有许多事在幕后进行，但几乎没有一件被报导出来。

sentences.english: This means that he appeared from behind a curtain after he had broken free.
sentences.chinese: 这意味他在挣脱后才会从布幕后出现。
某种类型的湿的幕后故事，耳朵背包客？

sentences.english: Viewers flocked to the program for its off-screen scandals as well as for the on-screen romance.
sentences.chinese: 不单是节目上的浪漫，幕后的丑闻也吸引着眼球。

sentences.english: Perhaps he is afraid to speak on any topic at all without Dick Cheney pulling his strings.
sentences.chinese: 大概没有迪克切尼的幕后操纵他害怕谈论任何话题。

sentences.english: He commands Paolo to curse the man behind the kidnapping.
sentences.chinese: 他命令保罗诅咒绑架的幕后主使者。

sentences.english: You cannot afford to use underhand business methods.
sentences.chinese: 你不能用幕后的商业手段。

sentences.english: In recent years, he shifted his focus to work behind the scenes.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，冯德伦将工作重点转移到幕后。

sentences.english: Proscenium , whom do play in backstage?

front of the stage
Taiqian county in Puyang 濮陽|濮阳[Pu2 yang2], Henan
malign agent who manipulates from behind the scenes/hidden hand/(Tw) mechanic/blue-collar worker/manual laborer
inside story/non-public information/behind the scenes/internal
plot/conspiracy
to hide (as an undercover agent)/an insider (in a gang of thieves)/a mole
lit. the first person to bury funerary dolls (idiom)/fig. the originator of an evil practice
big shot (leading some field or group)/godfather
key figure/the linchpin of sth
promoter/advocate/driving force/pushing hands (two-person training routine esp. in t'ai chi)
to boost support or interest/to campaign/to promote
to float up (idiom); to become evident/to surface/to appear
to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
sponsor/plotter/schemer
seat of honor/person in a high-ranking position/to be promoted to a more senior role/(genetics) epistatic
